entry.title: Turkey Chili
entry.summary: Instant pot altered Panera chili recipe Saute onions and olive oil for ~3 minutes. Add turkey and spices, brown…
entry.content:
Instant pot altered Panera chili recipe

Amount Ingredient
2 tbs olive oil
some onion
1 tsp salt
lots Rudy's Turkey Rub
1 tsp green chili powder
1 can kidney beans
1 can garbanzo beans
1 can whole kernel corn
1 can tomatos diced
1 can  tomato sauce
10 baby carrots

 Saute onions and olive oil for ~3 minutes. Add turkey and spices, brown the turkey.

Add remaining ingredients and cook on high pressure for 12 mintues.

entry.title: Thai Basil Chicken
entry.summary: A work in progress... Suggested: garlic - 4 cloves thai chiles (pestle and mortar smash chiles and garlic) dark…
entry.content:
A work in progress...

Suggested:

garlic - 4 cloves

thai chiles (pestle and mortar smash chiles and garlic)

dark sweet soy sauce

chicken

1/2 tsp sugar

thai basil

 

make a rub (mayo, smashed chiles, smashed garlic, soy sauce) - saute in instant pot

cook with some coconut milk (instead of water)

OR go for a rice dish (like lemon basil chicken)

entry.title: Almond Milk
entry.content:
From the bag.

Amount Ingredient
1 cup raw almonds
3 1/2 cups water
2 Medjool dates
1/2 tsp vanilla extract
1/4 tsp cinnamon
pinch sea salt

entry.title: Thai Basil Chicken
entry.summary: "Thai basil chicken, better known in Thai as pad kra pao gai (ผัดกระเพราไก่ pad ka prao gai), is a…
entry.content: "Thai basil chicken, better known in Thai as pad kra pao gai (ผัดกระเพราไก่ pad ka prao gai), is a contender for the most popular, and the most beloved Thai street food dish of all time."

entry.title: Tomato Soup
entry.summary: For the Vitamix Rinse and chop tomatoes in half. Add ingredients in order (from top down). Blend for ~5…
entry.content:
For the Vitamix

Amount Ingredient
1.5 cups Water
10 Roma tomatoes
10 baby carrots
small amount onion
dash thyme
several sprigs fresh basil
1/2 cup milk
? cream

Rinse and chop tomatoes in half. 

Add ingredients in order (from top down).

Blend for ~5 minutes to heat up. May need additional heat source.

Notes:

1/14/20 - not creamy/thick enough. May need to add cream (or replace milk with it). Check on other recipies for ideas.

entry.title: Pecan Milk
entry.summary: Pecan malk, cold brew coffee, is delicious. Notes:Buy raw, NOT pre-roasted nuts from the store1 cup = 4.4 oz…
entry.content:
Pecan malk, cold brew coffee, is delicious. 

Notes:

  • Buy raw, NOT pre-roasted nuts from the store
  • 1 cup = 4.4 oz of pecans (around 1/4 lb.)
  • Raw pecans from bins at Central Market (11.99/lb), Whole Foods (12.99/lb)
  • So, 1 cup of pecans ~$3 = 36oz = 8.3 cents/oz.
  • vs. Malk ~4.04 = 28 oz = 14.4 cents/oz.
  • vs. regular milk ~2.50 = 128 oz = 2 cents/oz.

entry.title: Oat Milk
entry.summary: For drinking goodness. Blend just water and date (so can get date chopped up first). Then add oats and…
entry.content:
For drinking goodness.

Amount Ingredient
3 cups water
1 Medjool date (pitted)
1/2 cup oats (quick/instant/rolled - NOT steel cut)
pinch salt

 Blend just water and date (so can get date chopped up first). Then add oats and blend for just 20-30 seconds (don't want to get too hot or gets thick/oatmealy).

Strain into jar.

entry.title: Coconut Curry Chicken
entry.summary: Made up, hope its good! Put coconut milk, sugar, and spices in instant pot. Add chicken (not on trivet).
entry.content:
Made up, hope its good!

Amount Ingredient
2 cups Coconut milk (vanilla, unsweetened)
~1 tbs fresh cut ginger
2 tbs brown sugar
1 tbs curry
3/4 tbs salt
1/4 tsp cayenne
1/2 tsp garlic powder

 Put coconut milk, sugar, and spices in instant pot. Add chicken (not on trivet). Cook for 8/9 minutes.

entry.title: Pear Wine
entry.summary: Yum yum yum. Quarter the pears, then smash with end of pint glass (or potato masher). Add the sugar,…
entry.content:
Yum yum yum.

Amount Ingredient
1 gallon (4 quarts) pears
4 1/2 cups sugar
1 qt boiling water
1/4 packet champagne yeast
1 package (1 oz) raisins (yeast nutrient)
1 cup black tea (tannin)
1/4 cup lemon juice

 Quarter the pears, then smash with end of pint glass (or potato masher).

Add the sugar, stir. Let stand for 6-12 hours as sugar extracts juices naturally.

Then add 1 qt boiling water. Let stand until room temperature.

Add the awkened yeast (in lukewarm water 5-10 minutes), raisins, tea, and lemon juice.

 

Made:

1/11/20 - with ~3 Bartlett Pears, 6 Best Ever Pears

entry.title: Green Chile Pork Carnitas
entry.summary: Attempt at Torchy's Green Chile Pork tacos Saute pork in 2 tbs olive oil. Mix rub (salt, pepper, green…
entry.content:
Attempt at Torchy's Green Chile Pork tacos

Amount Ingredient
2 tbs olive oil
1 tbs lime juice
1 blood orange
1 regular orange
1tbs cumin
4 tsp (or 1 1/3 tbs) green chili powder
1 tsp pepper
1 tsp salt
1 cup water
3-4 lb pork butt roast

Saute pork in 2 tbs olive oil.

Mix rub (salt, pepper, green chili powder, cumin), then rub onto sauteed pork.

Add oranges, lime juice, and water to instant pot. Then put pork back in.

Cook for 60 minutes.

Notes: if on trivet makes good meat, but doesn't get the flavors. Maybe put directly in sauce or powder the green chiles on meat after shredding the pork.
